tool_description: Processes refund payments to customers through appropriate payment channels and handles transaction recording.

refund_method.description: Refund method: credit_card, debit_card, paypal, store_credit, check

return_authorization_number.description: Return authorization associated with this refund

error_messages: Invalid customer ID: Customer not found in payment system.
Invalid refund amount: Amount must be greater than 0 and not exceed original purchase price.
Unsupported refund method: Must be one of [credit_card, debit_card, paypal, store_credit, check].
Transaction processing failed: Payment gateway rejected the refund transaction.
Original transaction not found: Cannot locate original purchase for refund reference.
Invalid return authorization: Authorization not found or not approved for refund.
usage: Provide customer_id, refund_amount, refund_method, original_transaction_id, and return_authorization_number. Tool processes payment and provides confirmation.

processing_status.description: Status of refund: processed, pending, failed
